text: @HouseGOP The issue is that @realDonaldTrump had a chance when #COVID19 was detected to alight the strength of #USA government to put a plan in place to stop the mass killing he allowed to occur. @FoxNews @MariaBartiromo Don't blame #China because #Donnie was golfing!
